tool.name: Build regulons from Aracne network
tool.help:
Usage: run_aracne2regulons.r [options]
Options: -o OUTPUT, --output=OUTPUT Path to output.
-e EXPR, --expr=EXPR Path to input expression matrix used to build ARACNE network.
-n NETWORK, --network=NETWORK Path to ARACNE network.txt.
-h, --help Show this help message and exit
